readme1: This contains a list of the ROMs for each temperature sensor, along with any extra metadata.
readme2: Since I am going to label each sensor with a number or code in physical form, I am going to key off of that in this file
readme3: To generate the ROM code, plug a sensor in (RED-3V3OUT, BLACK-GND, YELLOW-GP28) using Micro-python on the Pico and run the code in the "code" key
